name: Tech Empowerment
description: Providing digital skills training, tech tools, and exposure opportunities to prepare youths and women for global technology-driven careers.
details: Our Tech Empowerment Program provides comprehensive technology training, hands-on internships with leading tech companies, and micro-grants to support innovative startup ideas. This initiative aims to bridge the digital divide and create sustainable employment opportunities for youth in Okrika.
eligibility: Open to all Okrika residents aged 18-35 with interest in technology

name: Social Intervention
description: Supporting vulnerable families through welfare programs, community relief efforts, and targeted assistance aimed at improving daily living conditions.
details: The Social Intervention Fund focuses on empowering women and supporting children's education through micro-grants, scholarship programs, and community-based initiatives. This program aims to improve quality of life and create pathways to economic independence.
eligibility: Open to women and families in Okrika constituency

name: Educational Advancement Program
description: Promoting quality learning through scholarships, school support initiatives, and academic resources for students across Okrika.
details: Our Community Education Initiative provides comprehensive educational support including scholarships, school supplies, tutoring programs, and infrastructure improvements for schools in the constituency.
eligibility: Open to students and educational institutions in Okrika constituency

name: Health & Community Wellbeing
description: Implementing health outreaches, awareness campaigns, and community wellness initiatives to ensure a healthier constituency.
details: The Healthcare Access Program focuses on making quality healthcare services available to all residents through mobile clinics, health screenings, medication assistance, and health education programs.
eligibility: Open to all residents of Okrika constituency
